meanings.definition: The state or quality of being identical.
meanings.sent1: The identicalness of the twins made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The identicalness of the two paintings was uncanny.
meanings.sent3: The identicalness of the two cupcakes caused a playful argument over who baked them.
meanings.sent4: The identicalness of their voices was like listening to an echo.
meanings.sent5: The identicalness of the snowflakes was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The fact of being the same in every detail.
meanings.sent1: The identicalness of the fingerprints helped solve the case.
meanings.sent2: The identicalness of the two cars parked next to each other was striking.
meanings.sent3: The identicalness of their outfits at the party was a funny coincidence.
meanings.sent4: The identicalness of their handwriting made it hard for the teacher to tell who wrote the note.
meanings.sent5: The identicalness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete the picture.
